Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: The almost instantaneous feedback that can be tailored and refined specifically for what I was asking was almost like having a live tutor 1:1 assisting me, which helped me learn so much more than asking a question online and waiting days for a response which may not have completely been understood or relevant.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: In control of the feedback I needed and able to get, and supported because it was quick and tailored to me versus delayed, misunderstood and often generic like (refer back to general guide in the rubric)

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI does need to be tested and ensure is accurate, and requires a bit of coaching/prompting to ensure the feedback you get is how you want it- versus you canâ€™t coach/guide your university teacher to tailor to you, you have to adapt to their way.
